# Site Design — LLM Instructions for Building Websites

## Overview

This is a design system and template for building product landing pages. When asked to create a new site, follow these rules exactly. Every rule here was derived from real production work on merge-video.com.

- **Author**: Maxim Osovsky (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q107189449)
- **License**: MIT
- **Technology**: Pure HTML/CSS/JS. Zero npm dependencies.

## LLM Instructions

When creating or modifying a website for this author, follow all rules below.

### Stack
- Pure HTML5 + CSS3 + vanilla JS
- No React, Vue, Tailwind, Bootstrap, or any framework
- No npm, no build step
- Single `index.html` + single `style.css`
- Google Fonts only external dependency

### Fonts
- Body: `'Lato', sans-serif` (400, 700)
- Headings: `'Sora', sans-serif` (700)
- Buttons/system: `-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif`

### Color Palette
| Role | Light | Dark |
|------|-------|------|
| Background | `#fff` | `#0f0f1a` |
| Primary text | `#33334f` | `#e4e4f0` |
| Secondary text | `#767ead` | `#9a9ec4` |
| Muted text | `#999` | `#666` |
| Accent | `#6078ff` | `#818cf8` |
| Border | `#e2e4ef` | `#2a2a40` |
| Badge | green icon `#2a9d5c` on `#eef0ff` | green icon `#4ade80` on `#1a1a2e` |

### Dark Mode
- Use CSS variables in `:root` / `[data-theme="light"]` and `[data-theme="dark"]`
- Toggle via `data-theme` attribute on `<html>`
- Respect `prefers-color-scheme` on first load
- Store preference in `localStorage`

### Header Rules
1. Logo left: image + text
2. Nav links right: **plain text**, NOT buttons
3. Style: `color: #999; font-weight: 400; font-size: 15px`
4. Hover: `color: var(--text-primary)` — no underline, no borders
5. External links get SVG arrow icon (NOT Unicode ↗)
6. Logo text: `clamp(16px, 5vw, 24px)` + `white-space: nowrap`
7. **NO burger menu** — never hide navigation behind a hamburger icon

### SVG Arrow for External Links
```html
<svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
  stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
  <line x1="7" y1="17" x2="17" y2="7"/>
  <polyline points="7 7 17 7 17 17"/>
</svg>
```

### Hero Section
- Desktop: two-column flex (text left, image right)
- Mobile: text only, image hidden
- CTA buttons: hidden on desktop (duplicates header), visible on mobile
- Badge: pill shape, `border-radius: 20px`, hidden on mobile
- Title: `font-size: 40px` desktop, `26px` mobile
- Subtitle: max 2 sentences

### Features Section
- Desktop: 3 cards in a row, centered text, icon on top (emoji 48px)
- Mobile: vertical stack, horizontal layout (icon left + text right), titles hidden
- Gap: `30px` desktop, `14px` mobile

### Footer
- Desktop: text + social icons in a row
- Mobile: stacked, centered
- All text `#999`
- Links: `#999` → accent color on hover
- Social icons: gray → brand color on hover + `scale(1.2)`
  - Telegram: `#0088cc`
  - YouTube: `#FF0000`
  - Instagram: `#E4405F`
  - X/Twitter: `#000`
  - GitHub: `#333`
  - LinkedIn: `#0A66C2`

### Responsive Rules
- Single breakpoint: `@media (max-width: 768px)`
- Use `clamp()` for smooth font scaling
- Use `flex-shrink: 0` on elements that must not compress (logos, avatars)
- Never let text wrap in the header — scale font instead

### Animation Rules
- All transitions: `0.2s ease`
- Modal entrance: `0.25s ease`, `translateY(30px)` + fade
- Social icon hover: `0.25s`, `scale(1.2)` + color
- Theme switch: `0.3s` on background and color

### SEO — Always Include
- `<title>` — unique, descriptive
- `<meta name="description">`
- `<meta property="og:title/description/image/url">`
- `<meta name="twitter:card/title/description/image">`
- `<link rel="canonical">`
- Single `<h1>` per page
- Semantic HTML5 elements

### Favicon — Always Include
- 16×16, 32×32, 180×180 (apple-touch-icon)
- `site.webmanifest`

### Avatar / Auth (if applicable)
- Google rainbow border on hover: 4-color `box-shadow`
- `flex-shrink: 0` — never shrinks
- Dropdown: `#eef0ff` bg, purple shadow
- Sign Out: `#ff6b6b` → `#ff4444` on hover
- Tooltip: `#222` bg, hidden when dropdown open

### Modal (if applicable)
- macOS-style dots: red/yellow/green
- `border-radius: 20px`, purple-tinted shadow
- Mobile: slide-up from bottom, `border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0`, `max-height: 90vh`
- Entrance animation: `translateY(30px)` → `0` + fade

### Inputs (if applicable)
- Border: `2px solid #e2e4ef` → `#6078ff` on focus
- `border-radius: 8px`
- Toggle: gray `#ccc` → `#6366f1` on checked

## File Structure

```
project/
├── index.html
├── style.css
├── favicon/
│   ├── favicon-16.png
│   ├── favicon-32.png
│   ├── apple-touch-icon.png
│   └── site.webmanifest
├── hero.png
├── llms.txt
└── llms-full.txt
```

## Anti-Patterns — NEVER Do This

1. ❌ Never use CSS frameworks (Tailwind, Bootstrap)
2. ❌ Never use burger/hamburger menus
3. ❌ Never use Unicode arrows (↗) — always SVG
4. ❌ Never use `font-weight: bold` on nav links — keep `400`
5. ❌ Never use external CDN CSS files for layout
6. ❌ Never hide all mobile navigation — keep CTAs visible in hero
7. ❌ Never skip favicon or SEO meta tags
8. ❌ Never hardcode colors — use CSS variables
9. ❌ Never use placeholders for images — use real assets
10. ❌ Never let avatars or logos compress — always `flex-shrink: 0`
